title: The Logic Master
subtitle: Logical Operators (AND, OR, NOT)
hints: Use && for AND - both conditions must be true: (level >= 15 && gold >= 1000)
Use || for OR - at least one condition must be true: (hasGuild || level >= 20)
Use ! for NOT - inverts a boolean: !inCombat
Remember to use parentheses ( ) around your conditions
In C#: && is AND, || is OR, ! is NOT (different from Python's 'and', 'or', 'not')
learningObjectives: Use AND (&&) operator to require multiple conditions
Use OR (||) operator for alternative conditions
Use NOT (!) operator to invert boolean values
Combine logical operators in complex conditions
